name: 2023 12th International Conference on Educational and Information Technology
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published into conference proceedings by IEEE, which is the same with the last years. The proceedings will be submitted and reviewed by the IEEE Xplore and Ei Compendex and Scopus after the conference. ICEIT 2023 is listed in IEEE conference calendarï¼šhttps://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/57125 Excellent papers will be selected and recommended to the SCI journals: 1\. International Journal of Computers Communications & Control 2\. Internationl Journal of Simulation Modelling
